articles.title: New Argentina coach Michael Cheika looks set to add fellow Leinster legend Felipe Contepomi to his staff
articles.description: FORMER Leinster boss Michael Cheika has been appointed Argentina coach through to next year’s World Cup — and Felipe Contepomi is set to join his
articles.content:
FORMER Leinster boss Michael Cheika has been appointed Argentina coach through to next year’s World Cup — and Felipe Contepomi is set to join his management team.

articles.title: U.S. soy supply outlook cut as export demand rises
articles.description: CHICAGO, March 9 (Reuters) - The domestic stockpile of soybeans will be smaller than previously thought as crop shortfalls in Brazil and Argentina boost export demand for U.S. supplies, the government said on Wednesday.Soybean stocks for the 2021/22 marketing year were pegged at 285 million bushels, the U.S. Agriculture Department said in its monthly World Agricultural Supply
articles.content:
CHICAGO, March 9 (Reuters) - The domestic stockpile of soybeans will be smaller than previously thought as crop shortfalls in Brazil and Argentina boost export demand for U.S. supplies, the government said on Wednesday.

articles.title: URGENT-Spain's lobbying European Commission to buy corn from Argentina amid Ukraine supply gap

articles.title: Russia-Ukraine Crisis an Opportunity for India to Become Self-reliant in Edible Oil
articles.description: Amidst the Russia-Ukraine war, imports of sunflower oil are getting affected. India imports 25 lakh tonnes of sunflower oil annually, of which 70 per cent comes from Ukraine, 20 per cent from Russia and 10 per cent from Argentina.
articles.content: History has time and again shown that opportunists have benefitted whenever there has been a war between nations. Amidst the Russia­-Ukraine war, imports of sunflower oil are getting affected. India imports 25 lakh tonnes of sunflower oil annually, o... [6846 chars]
